snippet: Flooded with fashion editors, bloggers, celebrities and, of course, models, hotels will be celebrating with parties, panels, shopping and specialty drinks (care for a Kate Moss Cosmo?).

headline.main: 10 Hotels to Rub Shoulders With the Tastemakers During Fashion Week
